title: New: FAMY – Friends Home
content:
London three piece FAMY have just released their third single from their debut album WE FAM ECONO (due on the 8th of september) and it’s bloody lovely.

Friends Home may struggle to escape the Coldplay comparisons, but that doesn’t stop the track being a beautifully composed four minutes that’s plentiful in emotion and gorgeous melody. Having already been premiered by Zane Lowe on BBCR1, FAMY are surely destined for mainstream success, their enormous pop driven sound perfect for both the road and the airwaves. Stream it below and see what I mean:
